shortdesc.ph: Options for the local audio observer.

plentry.pd:
Whether the SDK captures the audio frames after they are recorded.
: The SDK captures the audio frames after they are recorded. The callback is triggered.
: (Default) The SDK does not capture the audio frame after they are recorded. The callback is not triggered.

Whether the SDK captures the audio frames before they are played. The callback is triggered.
: The SDK captures the audio frames before they are played. The callback is triggered.
: (Default) The SDK does not capture the audio frame before they are played. The callback is not triggered.

Whether the SDK captures the audio frames after they are mixed. The callback is triggered.
: The SDK captures the audio frames after they are mixed. The callback is triggered.
: (Default) The SDK does not capture the audio frames after they are mixed. The callback is not triggered.
The number of channels of the captured audio frames (data is interleaved, if stereo). The default is 1.
Sample rate (Hz) of the captured audio frames. The default is 32000 Hz.
